lead_paragraph: Mark Calcavecchia made 10 birdies and tied the course record with a nine-under-par 62, going from the middle of the pack to a share of the lead with Heath Slocum after the third round of the PODS Championship at the Innisbrook Resort and Golf Club in Palm Harbor, Fla. Slocum secured the tie by birdieing the last hole.
